Question: What is Legitt AI-Powered Contract Management Software?
Answer: Legitt's AI-Powered Contract Management Software streamlines and automates the entire contract lifecycle. This makes it significantly easier to create, track, and organize your documents in an efficient manner.

Question: How Can I Contact Support If I Encounter an Issue with the Product?
Answer: If you encounter any issues with our product, please don't hesitate to contact us. Send an email to info@legittai.com with the subject line 'Product Name Issue'. We're here to help!

Question: How Long Does It Take to Resolve an Issue?
Answer: We strive to resolve issues as quickly as possible. Once we receive your email, our support team will get in touch with you promptly to address your concerns.
